metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3548 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.x before 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors that trigger an AJAX exception dialog.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3548` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
